website_summaries.verdict: Wind-tested by the College of Aeronautics to sustain 55 mph gusts.
pros: Double canopy and with a fiberglass shaft and comfort-grip handle, this has no metal parts, to avoid attracting lightning when on the course
cons: Some issues with the flimsiness of the plastic latch that holds the umbrella open

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella; had an issue and the company immediately responded
customer_reviews.text: A really nice umbrella that seems very sturdy and well built. But after just a few months, the mechanism to keep the umbrella locked in the deployed position stopped working properly. I submitted an inquiry on the vendor web site and they responded immediately and are sending a replacement. Very impressed with the customer service. It appears an isolated defect ... which does happen. Our second umbrella works fine.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 umbrellas. One was just over a period of one year. When I finally did use the other, it broke on the very first use. And it broke not even 5 minutes later. This umbrella is a hype. Don't waste your money. Since I had it over a year Gust buster wanted me to ship it back costing me more money., and include 10 more dollars so they could ship it back , either fixed or replace. I chose to do neither and give them a negative, and you a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Dadu

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: I had another umbrella some company lost it. I felt like what just happened. But got this one and I will never buy any umbrella if its not from this company worth every penny. Love love. While everyone made fun of me for spending so much money on this. They see while the wind gust and their umbrella break my is standing strong.
customer_reviews.author: kelly manon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent umbrellas for gusty weather
customer_reviews.text: Gustbuster makes the best umbrellas. The only ones I've tried that stand up to NYC gusty weather and NEVER turn inside out. The spine hinges do break eventually, but my first lasted nearly 3 years.that's pretty good for this price point .
customer_reviews.author: Austin H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this umbrella to use at my sons' baseball and football games to shield us from the sun and rain after seeing one of our friends with one. Was looking for an umbrella that had our team colors so we can show lots of team spirit from head to toe! Very sturdy, well made and covers a large surface area (me and the baby stroller). It was a bit difficult to open at first but after a few uses it has gotten easier. It is becoming a popular item with other team parents as we have seen several in the crowds since having purchased ours. Can't wait to see how it handles the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Fail- do not buy for TX storms WX
customer_reviews.text: I've broken it two times- one of which was brand new and in light winds it broke. I returned it via mail and paid shopping both ways. Just to drop it and it broke. Will never buy again ad will never ship it again to be repaired- I have so much money into this crappy umbrella that does not perform as the videos show it can withstand.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: ... of these to this day because i had a great experience with the first 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these to this day because i had a great experience with the first 2. I ended losing them which is why i had to repurchase. The last one i gave up with. It came with a defect where the umbrella wouldn't click correctly when fully extended. The warranty wasn't looking that helpful for me since i used my umbrella after one month after purchasing it. I will be purchasing one more time and hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Although, I bought this umbrella almost 3 years back I’ve only had to use it 10 to 15 times. I keep it on the back seat of Jeep in the case provided. I needed today, but I opened it up and the arm broke into two pieces. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: john59oldcar

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply the best umbrellas I've ever owned. I guess everybody recognizes the quality because every time I leave one anywhere out of sight for more than a few minutes it gets stolen! Even at the golf club for goodness sake! It's not like the people there can't afford any umbrella they want... The only caution that I have is that if you are a golfer make sure you get the fiberglas shaft model as there are other shaft types and the people selling them don't always make that clear.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mudry

customer_reviews.title: ... soccer games in the rain and this umbrella is awesome. It can take the windiest of storms and ...
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time at soccer games in the rain and this umbrella is awesome. It can take the windiest of storms and is big enough to keep two people dry. Highly recommended for carting to games but would not travel on planes or in a brief case well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barnett

customer_reviews.title: My favorite umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: This is my second gustbuster and the handles on the new ones aren't as nice as my old one. I purchased this one because I needed more shade at my kids baseball games. I still have the original one I bought ten years ago and it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tsunami

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: While playing golf, I used this umbrella when we got caught in a thunderstorm which had a lot of wind and some hail. Yes, we got out of the storm, and the umbrella performed like a champ. I don't actually use it that often, but when you need it, it is really nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: SanJoseBill

customer_reviews.title: Catch failed on second opening
customer_reviews.text: Must have opened it inside or something? Big, seemingly well-constructed, and the first time I opened it seemed OK. Then it sat undisturbed in a closet until the next rain and on that day -- it won't stay open. The catch appears to have receded too far into the shaft. I can wiggle it loose with gentle tug of pliers, but it won't catch.
customer_reviews.author: K. Black

customer_reviews.title: Tough umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Durable and Great umbrella during windstorms and lightning. Con: No button to instantly open the umbrella. Hard to open when your arms are full of groceries or holding your puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Baia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best umbrella I’ve ever owned. Would purchase again. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella. Completely windproof. I do have to say, that despite the large size, it has a much greater curve than most umbrellas, so it is not tremendously wide. For me this is excellent, I get better coverage, but dont poke other people in the eye. It could be used for two people, but might be tight for such usage.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Home Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass tip
customer_reviews.text: Only used umbrella twice love the sturdiness and size. Will update post in a year for fairer evaluation. Would have got five stars if not for plastic tip. For the money I paid should have been traditional metal tip.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buettler

customer_reviews.title: I really like this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I really like this umbrella; however, I was a little disappointed that it was not the exact color that the picture revealed to me online. So far so good on holding up in rain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!  Good product, reasonable price, fast delivery - great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! Good product, reasonable price, fast delivery - great seller! This umbrella is great on windy days!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't tested in strong wind / rain storm yet, it is clear that this is a high quality product that I should get many years of use out of!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is huge and covers most of the body to keep dry. On windy days this umbrella withstands the wind gust while other peoples umbrella get blown away or break apart. It's worth the money to buy this umbrella that will last you a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best rated umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these umbrellas after Golf Digest rated it as the best golf umbrella. If it's good for bad weather on a golf course, then it's good at everything!
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Best made golf umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: GustBuster makes the best umbrellas. Nothing more to say than that.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this big umbrella. Big enough for two people to use, and it works great even in the wind. The automatic opener is also very handy for opening in the middle of a rain shower.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: We love GustBuster umbrellas. They are second-to-none when it comes to stormy weather with wind and rain. This is large enough to keep me dry with at least one other person underneath. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Berger

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable umbrella. I work in Chicago, yes the windy city, OMG this thing is incredible. I used to get soaked to the bone with my old cheapy unbrella. This one DOES NOT invert and I get to the office dry. Awesome, Awesome, Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: this is a great Umbrella. The only slight thing I do not ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great Umbrella. The only slight thing I do not like is the weight. It is a little heavier than other umbrella I had.
customer_reviews.author: Trung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella. Have had it 6 months or so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. Have had it 6 months or so now. Bought it for soccer games where it can get pretty windy out on the fields in Texas. Has held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie English

customer_reviews.title: Greater than my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a legit umbrella. I have used it twice so far and it can really protect itself from the wind quite well. I would definitely recommend this product to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: parth shorey

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: This was only $39 due to the color but I think the color is great. Best umbrella I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Very well made golf umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made golf umbrella. Haven't had a chance yet to test it in big wind, but it does keep you dry in a down pour.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very strong umbrella, bought the normal umbrellas by golf ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong umbrella,bought the normal umbrellas by golf product manufacturers but they never last as long as this one, which is a little more expensive but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest de Gannes

customer_reviews.title: Did not invert in high winds
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried the umbrella out we were having high wind warnings, and I was very pleased because the umbrella did NOT invert! My only complaint is that it is hard to open and close. I wold have preferred an automatic opener.
customer_reviews.author: MLJ

customer_reviews.title: Golf Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: My family said it matched the golf cart and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: wonderful even in Chicago!
customer_reviews.text: In Chicago it rains sideways because it is so windy. Highly recommend this, withstands the winds as advertised and big enough to keep you dry
customer_reviews.author: jsjj42000

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, using in the marine environment to block sun and constant windy conditions on moving vessel. Only umbrella up for this challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item is by far superior to other umbrellas. This item was shipped fast. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kynamo

customer_reviews.title: Golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is great! Holds up to wind, curves around enough even when the rain is swirling around and is nice and large. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn D. Godlewski

customer_reviews.title: quite a lot heavier than others I've had
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color but it is a lot heavier than other golf umbrellas I've used. Sounds silly but in a rainstorm it quickly becomes fatiguing.
customer_reviews.author: davesrarereview

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very heavy and feels insecure in my hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE GustBuster
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella! It never dissappoints me in the wind and rain. I bought one for everyone on my Christmas list and they love theirs, too. I would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Fiorino Donofrio

customer_reviews.title: Never go out without it
customer_reviews.text: I actually already had a black & red one. I bought this second one as a spare to keep at the office. With all the wind and rain we get here it's the perfect umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Kats

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested it out but seems to be good quality, and it's large! I would recommend it. Great gift
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: the best!
customer_reviews.text: THIS is the best umbrella ever. *IF* I ever need another umbrella, it will be one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Capnbill76

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Non conductive.  Opens and closes perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go in my Wife's new Audi Q5. Wanted the best umbrella for the best small SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Michael Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay open
customer_reviews.text: It is nearly impossible to open the umbrella and to keep it open. It does not click into the open position without tremendous effort that can take several minutes. My wife and son cannot open it at all. The one I received is absolute garbage, however, I cannot say weather the one I received was defective or they are all like this.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Engel

customer_reviews.title: I love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella..I got one as a gift about ten years ago and it is still works great..almost the whole family can fit under it..there's no worry about this umbrella blowing away..I had to buy another one to place in my other vehicle..this is the only brand I will ever buy again
customer_reviews.author: Antonia L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great in heavy wind
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Does great in the wind, and our school colors to boot!
customer_reviews.author: CascadiaNow

customer_reviews.title: GustBuster Gold umbrella best for us.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the GustBuster Gold umbrella to take to our grandkids sporting events. Perfect for year round protection of the weather. Well made. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Size Umbrella Received but the Better Choice
customer_reviews.text: Wrong colour umbrella shipped originally but received great service for the replacement. When replacement received, it was the correct colour but smaller size; however, it actually worked out much better. The umbrella was a gift, it seemed to be good quality, and looked great. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: High and Dry
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy umbrella. Big diameter for us tall guys in a wind driven shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymes

customer_reviews.title: very difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: the umbrella is so difficult to open that I dont want to use it unless i have to. It is actually painful to use one's fingers to push/slide the button and get it open. I wish I had not purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The paint or finish on the shafts was uneven and there were spots where you could see shiny metal underneath. It should not have left the factory like that. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional on rainy days and does not come apart when it is windy. Gives great coverage even with two people.Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DAHE

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and large
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and large. We live in an area of hurricanes and heavy winds and has never been caught and turned inside out by strong winds
customer_reviews.author: Nika wife and mother of 3 kiddos

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: After two uses the umbrella would not stay open. I called Gustbuster customer service and they replied that it is guaranteed for life. So, I returned it and they reaired it with courtesy. Nice service!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Q

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is large enough to fit two people under it. Very sturdy. It would never invert in the wind like the cheeper umbrellas would.
customer_reviews.author: Dcypher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was more than I expected, it's well built and has a fiberglass shaft (very sturdy). It comes with a cover and the material is tough, but lightweight. The color was an exact match to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: A big and sturdy umbrella that has held up against some strong winds and rain without folding, ready for anything now
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for the value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the umbrella was big enough to cover two people. In addition, if it is good enough for the PGA, it must be a good product. I would buy more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Fan

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally hard to open to a locked position.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally hard to open to a locked position. Shouldn't take 2-3 tries every time. When I saw reviews (before I bought) that said exactly what I am now complaining about, I ignored them and disregarded what "had" to be agenda driven comments. Nope. This umbrella is a pain to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Orslene

customer_reviews.title: Broken shaft
customer_reviews.text: Took my brand new umbrella to my sons soccer game to my surprise when I opened it the shaft was broken!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to keep me and kids dry and light enough to want to use it. Have one for the golf bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: IU Hoops

customer_reviews.title: My gustbuster
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella, very large and protects you and your cloths from acidic rain!!! Also fashionable too and wind proof. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rubyred

customer_reviews.title: When it rains I will be ready
customer_reviews.text: great !!!! well made !!!! would recommend to any one who need protection on the course. Let it rain and rain
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Perkovich

customer_reviews.title: GustBuster 62"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella on Nov 1, 2012 and I did not get it until Nov 14, 2012. The shipping and handling took a very long time, by then I had to suffer in the rain without an umbrella. Besides the delay, when I received my umbrella, the quality is great. You get what you paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the package, and handle came off when opening it. It's surprising that it got it this far with such a blatant issue. Will try again and hope that this just escaped their quality process. UPDATE: Umbrella no longer stays up. After a little while or light shaking, it just folds. It's been 3 years, but still...
customer_reviews.author: Rajo

customer_reviews.title: Great, good size, great wind resistance.  Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big umbrella. I read a lot of reviews for this. It was a great price especially with the wind speeds it can handle. I have been out with 45 mph gusts successfully. I don't golf I use it to walk my dogs. Fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

product_meta.title: GustBuster Proseries 62-Inch Golf Umbrella (Style 2)
product_meta.description: GustBuster's golf umbrella featuring a rubber comfort grip handle is available in many colors and three styles. Award winning double canopy available in pro series gold 62-Inches and tour size 68-Inches. Lightning resisting, lightweight, super-strength fiberglass shaft. Hand-contoured rubber comfort grip handles. High impact, injection-molded protective ferrule fits into smallest golf bag holder. Double velcro closure straps. Lighter weight than comparably-sized ordinary umbrellas. New pinchless open/close release system. Available in every color and combination imaginable. Wind-tested by College of Aeronautics to 55+ mph.
feature_bullets: THE GOLFER’S CHOICE – The Pro Series golf umbrella is the #1 umbrella on the PGA, LPGA, and Champions tours. The lightweight and reliable construction makes the Pro Series a must-have in every golf bag, from the amateur to the pro!

BUST THE GUST – This weatherproof umbrella features a sturdy waterproof 100% nylon canopy. Combined with its unique patented double canopy design, the Pro Series lets the wind out while keeping you dry!
UNFLIPPABLE, UNFLAPPABLE, UNLEAKABLE – The Pro Series utilizes GustBuster's award-winning double canopy design, which has been tested in winds up to 55mph without flipping, folding, or leaking!

WIND-DEFYING CONSTRUCTION - The Pro Series features a pinch-less open and close release system, a lightning resistant shaft, a hand-contoured rubber comfort grip, and a lightweight super-strength fiberglass shaft that prevents crimping and snapping.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – The GustBuster Pro Series is backed by our 30-day money back guarantee as well as a limited lifetime warranty.
